H0.text: The pelvis is the section of the skeleton formed by the right and left hip bones together with the sacrum and coccyx.

H1.text: Necklash is the section of the skeleton that consists of the right and left hip bones together with the sacrum and coccyx.

H2.text: Tail bone is the section of the skeleton formed by the right and left hip bones, the sacrum, and the coccyx.

H3.text: Uterus is the section of the skeleton formed by the right and left hip bones, with the addition of the sacrum and coccyx.
